channel.title: odin on Reside-IC
channel.description: Recent content in odin on Reside-IC

item.title: odin 0.2.0
item.description: After a rather long period of gestation, yesterday I merged in a long-running rewrite of odin. This is a major rework of odin which lays the groundwork for future improvements later this year. Odin is our package for working with differential equations at a high level - it includes support for the sort of “structured compartmental models” that we use a lot in the department, compiling these to C for efficient execution.
